location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Rough sketch showing autumn, winter, and spring migrations of the Lower Euphrates sheep donkey & camel Tribes’

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Pen and ink with crayon on paperDimensions:208 x 340 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Hand drawn sketch map showing the seasonal migrations of the Lower Euphrates tribes (Ajwad, Bani Said, and Bani Malik - all Muntafiq) around Kuwait and along the Iraq-Najd frontier. Also features Ikhwan (Shammar, Mutair, and Ajman) movements with a detail description provided in the report (folio 131-135).
